title: Colleges of Advanced Education
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Malcolm Smith and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Colleges of Advanced Education offer a practical alternative to University training in a number of technical and creative fields. This film examines the wide range of studies being undertaken in Colleges of Advanced Education, all over Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: John Martin-Jones, Malcolm Smith and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
